meta.content: Please visit the link listed below to find out more about Remote Learning. AJCHS will begin Remote Learning on Monday, April 13.Yearbooks are on sale NOW! Visit the link on the home page TODAY to ensure your copy of the Wildcat Lair Yearbook for the 19-20 school year.As we all said goodbye to Conrad Birdie…

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-2 wp-custom-logo wp-embed-responsive sticky-header custom-colors author-hidden

img.figcaption: Please visit the link listed below to find out more about Remote Learning. AJCHS will begin Remote Learning on Monday, April 13.
Yearbooks are on sale NOW! Visit the link on the home page TODAY to ensure your copy of the Wildcat Lair Yearbook for the 19-20 school year.
As we all said goodbye to Conrad Birdie and the 1950s over the weekend, more than 60 students were able to showcase their many talents in the musical.

Students in the PLTW Computer Programming class have been learning several coding languages in class. This last week students have been programming Self Driving Vehicles to see colors, interact with cones, and drive through the halls at AJ!

figure.figcaption: UPDATED 4/3/2020 Please click on the image for the latest information regarding Remote Learning at A-J.

div.p: For more ways to order your yearbook, please click HERE.
ATTENTION SENIORS! Please fill out this short survey for The Gazette and Yearbook.
